name: Apricot-Chocolate Pecan Pie Bites
author: lutzflcat
summary: These mini pecan bites are the perfect finger food for dessert, enticingly addictive. One bite and they'll be asking, “what is that in there?” For planning purposes, figure 2 or 3 (maybe more) per person.
ingredients: 1 (1.9 ounce) package mini phyllo tart shells (such as Athens®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or foil
Place the phyllo cups on the baking sheet
Add about 1/4 teaspoon apricot preserves to each cup, followed by 1/4 teaspoon mini chocolate chips; set aside
Combine pecans, brown sugar, half-and-half, honey, and rum extract in a small mixing bowl
Distribute the pecan mixture equally among the phyllo cups
Bake in the preheated oven until edges start to turn golden brown, about 10 minutes
Let cool for about 10 minutes before serving
